Title: RNA sequencing analysis of covR-deficient Streptococcus agalactiae during Zn intoxication
Description: Total RNA was isolated from mid-log phase Streptococcus agalactiae cells deficient in CovR (∆covR strain GU2400), grown in Todd-Hewitt broth (THB) medium, supplemented with 0.25 mM Zn and sequenced using Illumina NextSeq500
